sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: We evaluated outpatients referred to Centre for Tropical Diseases. This study was approved by the ethics committee of Guangzhou University hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine (Guang-zhou, China).

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
